metadata.title: CVE-2020-14398 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. An improperly closedTCP connection causes an infinite loop in libvncclient/sockets.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14398` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
x11vnc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
veyon package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
